title: Appointment booking
content:
Beware of Phishing SMS

HSBC will never ask customers to contact third-party insurance companies via SMS links or phone numbers. All our one-way SMS bears IDs starting with '#' only. Stay vigilant! Learn more.

We use cookies to give you the best possible experience on our website. By continuing to browse this site, you give consent for cookies to be used. For more details please read our Cookie Policy.

Top of the content

Enter Details Step 1 of 2 Enter Details      Step 1 of 2

Acknowledgement Step 2 of 2 Acknowledgement      Step 2 of 2

Step 1 of 2

Appointment Booking

Please resolve the invalid fields below to continue

    The information submitted through this web page is encrypted during transmission. However, it is important that you do not provide your account, credit card numbers, convey any confidential information or banking instructions in the 'Remarks' section. Before you contact us, please read our Privacy and Security statementthis link will open in a new window.

    Please note that this message function is not intended for giving urgent instructions or reporting an urgent matter (for example reporting of fraud or suspicious transactions). If you suspect fraud or suspicious transactions, please call our customer service hotline.

     

    Please fill in the form in English or Traditional Chinese only.

    Make an appointment for account opening at select branches via eTicketing and get appointment confirmation instantly.

    View the list of select branches.

    For other branches, you can fill in below information.

    Note: We will call you within the next 2 business days (exclude Saturday) to clarify your preferred appointment date and branch.  Related branch will call you to confirm the appointment date and time afterwards.

    max 1,000 characters
    Step 2 of 2

    Appointment Booking

    Thanks for using Appointment Booking Service.

    This is an acknowledgement of your instruction. We will contact you within the next 2 business days for further details of a meeting. If you need immediate assistance, please call our hotline or visit our branch.

    We want to understand your needs before we meet with you. This way, we can provide you with a better, more personalised experience and save you up to 15 minutes in our meeting. All you have to do is prepare a few things in advance.

    Review your investor profile

    Help us get to know you better. We'd like to understand your risk appetite, financial situation and investment knowledge. 

    Investments > Products and services > Investor Profile

    We regret that the service is temporarily not available. Please try again later.
